reqs:
This course is: "JRNL 400 Feminist Postcolonial Critique and Journalism in a Digital Age". Students will be transferred to this course code in the fall.
The course is reserved for Bachelor of Media (BMS) and School of Journalism students. For all other students interested in the cousre, please contact the Graduate School of Journalism.
courseName: Special Topics in Contemporary Journalism - FEM POSTCOL CRTQ
